Plot: The team of people who saved Winter's life reassemble in the wake of her surrogate mother's passing in order to find her a companion so she can remain at the Clearwater Marine Hospital.
Title: Dolphin Tale 2
Writer: Charles Martin Smith, Karen Janszen (characters), Noam Dromi (characters)
Actors: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Austin Highsmith, Harry Connick Jr.
tomatoConsensus: Much like its predecessor, Dolphin Tale 2 offers animal antics and sweet, old-fashioned drama that the whole family can enjoy.
